title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-2.19 - Minimum required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-2.19 - Minimum required

State Regulations
A minimum over travel of 12 inches shall be provided at
the top. Exceptions: (1)

In installations where the head room
under a ceiling or roof is not sufficient to allow 12 inches overrun, the car
counterweight shall be arranged to land 12 inches before car beam strikes the
overhead work. (2)

Hand power
dumbwaiters. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
8-2.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
